dmca.title: Web DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to The Planet
dmca.body:
Dear Sir/Madam,


I'd like to ask you to delete all the x-cart files at
www.conceptasylum.com/commissary 

This request is corroborated by the DIGITAL MILLENNIUM COPYRIGHT ACT, the
infringement notice can be found in the attachment.

Please inform me about the progress in this issue.

--
Sincerely yours,
[redacted]
Licensing Manager

Qualiteam corp.             [web site] www.x-cart.com, www.litecommerce.com
[redacted]     [ phone  ] +[redacted]  (9:00-18:00 GMT +4)
432072 Ulyanovsk, Russia    [ fax    ] +[redacted]  (on a 24 hours
basis)

---
[attachment]
Copyright Infringement Notice
Notice of Copyright Infringement


The copyrighted work at issue appears at www.x-cart.com.

The material that is infringing on copyrighted work is located at: URL: www.conceptasylum.com/commissary. The above pages contain php code content that has been copied from www.x-cart.com website.

My contact information:
[redacted]
Licensing manager
Creative Development LLC
[redacted], Ulyanovsk, Russia
[redacted]

Contact information for the infringing party:
Motor City Concepts
[redacted]
[redacted]
Sterling Heights, MI 48313, US
Phone:   +[redacted]
[redacted]@dhdrw.com

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.


[redacted], on behalf of [redacted]
09-Aug-05
